Package org.lgdcloudsim.intrascheduler

Class IntraSchedulerSimple

java.lang.Object
org.lgdcloudsim.intrascheduler.IntraSchedulerSimple
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatacenterEntity, Identifiable, Nameable, IntraScheduler
Direct Known Subclasses:
IntraSchedulerFirstFit, IntraSchedulerFixedPartitionRandom, IntraSchedulerLeastRequested, IntraSchedulerPartitionMultiLevel, IntraSchedulerRandom
public class IntraSchedulerSimple extends Object implements IntraScheduler
The simple intra-scheduler that implements the IntraScheduler interface. It is used to schedule the instances in the data center. The scheduling strategy is as follows:
  • Get the latest synchronization partition id from the StatesManager.
  • Find the suitable host from a random start host id in the latest synchronization partition.
  • If there is no suitable host the latest synchronization partition, try to find the suitable host from the last two synchronization partitions and so on.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Anonymous

    • excludeTime

      double excludeTime
      The time needed to exclude. It will record the time for each scheduler to obtain status, and this part of the time will be subtracted from the final calculation of the total scheduling time. Because it may take a long time for the scheduler to obtain the state through the state manager, if no exclusions are performed, the scheduling time may not be significantly related to the number of traversals.

    • random

      Random random
      The random number generator.

    • scheduleInstances

      protected IntraSchedulerResult scheduleInstances(List<Instance> instances, SynState synState)
      Schedule the instances to the host. The scheduling strategy is as follows:
      • Get the latest synchronization partition id from the StatesManager.
      • Find the suitable host from start to end in the partition according to the synchronization partition id.
      • If there is no suitable host the latest synchronization partition, try to find the suitable host from the last two synchronization partitions and so on.
      Parameters:
      instances - the instances to be scheduled
      synState - the synchronization state
      Returns:
      the result of the scheduling

    • setDatacenter

      public void setDatacenter(Datacenter datacenter)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      datacenter - the Datacenter component to set
